infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Vault secret expiration date not set
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Expiration date is not set for Azure Vault secret
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Secret rotation will not be enforced, which can lead to use of stale or compromised credentials
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `expiration_date` attribute to date in the future, with format `Y-m-d'T'H:M:S'Z'`, e.g.`2019-01-01T01:02:03Z`

remediation.terraform: Set `expiration_date` attribute to date in the future, with format `Y-m-d'T'H:M:S'Z'`, e.g.`2019-01-01T01:02:03Z`
remediation.arm: Set `properties.attributes.exp` attribute to date in the future time in seconds, e.g. `1658319657`

iacDescription.issue: Expiration date is not set for Azure Vault secret
iacDescription.impact: Secret rotation will not be enforced, which can lead to use of stale or compromised credentials
iacDescription.resolve: Set `expiration_date` attribute to date in the future, with format `Y-m-d'T'H:M:S'Z'`, e.g.`2019-01-01T01:02:03Z`

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Azure Container Registry Admin is enabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Azure Container Registry Admin is enabled

iacDescription.issue: Azure Container Registry Admin is enabled
iacDescription.impact: The admin user account is a technical account that allows depersonalized access and should be replaced by personalized, managed identities.
iacDescription.resolve: Set `admin_enabled` to `false`, or remove the property from the resource

iacDescription.impact: Missing geo replication leads to reduced availability of container images
iacDescription.resolve: Set a `georeplications` block within the resource, including a valid `location` property

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Ensure Diagnostic Setting captures appropriate categories
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Ensure Diagnostic Setting captures appropriate categories
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Not capturing the diagnostic setting categories for appropriate management activities leads to missing important alerts
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set log blocks for the categories `Administrative`,`Alert`,`Policy`,`Security` with `enabled` set to `true` for each

remediation.terraform: Set log blocks for the categories `Administrative`,`Alert`,`Policy`,`Security` with `enabled` set to `true` for each

iacDescription.issue: Ensure Diagnostic Setting captures appropriate categories
iacDescription.impact: Not capturing the diagnostic setting categories for appropriate management activities leads to missing important alerts
iacDescription.resolve: Set log blocks for the categories `Administrative`,`Alert`,`Policy`,`Security` with `enabled` set to `true` for each

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: VM Agent is not provisioned automatically for Windows
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: VM Agent is not provisioned automatically for Windows
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: VM Agent reduces management overhead by enabling straightforward bootstrapping of monitoring and configuration of guest OS

remediation.arm: Set `properties.osProfile.windowsConfiguration.provisionVMAgent` to `true`, or remove the property from the resource

iacDescription.issue: VM Agent is not provisioned automatically for Windows
iacDescription.impact: VM Agent reduces management overhead by enabling straightforward bootstrapping of monitoring and configuration of guest OS

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Virtual machine is configured with password authentication for admin
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Administrative password has been set in configuration file
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: The secret value will be readable to anyone with access to VCS, which can lead to unauthorized data disclosure or privilege escalation
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `admin_ssh_key` attribute instead of password authentication

remediation.terraform: Set `admin_ssh_key` attribute instead of password authentication
remediation.arm: Set `properties.osProfile.linuxConfiguration.ssh` attribute instead of password authentication

iacDescription.issue: Administrative password has been set in configuration file
iacDescription.impact: The secret value will be readable to anyone with access to VCS, which can lead to unauthorized data disclosure or privilege escalation
iacDescription.resolve: Set `admin_ssh_key` attribute instead of password authentication

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Linux virtual machine has password authentication enabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Linux virtual machine has password authentication enabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Password authentication is less resistant to brute force and educated guess attacks then SSH public key authentication
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `disable_password_authentication` attribute to `true` or remove the attribute

remediation.terraform: Set `disable_password_authentication` attribute to `true` or remove the attribute
remediation.arm: Set `properties.osProfile.linuxConfiguration.disablePasswordAuthentication` attribute to `true` or remove the attribute

iacDescription.issue: Linux virtual machine has password authentication enabled
iacDescription.impact: Password authentication is less resistant to brute force and educated guess attacks then SSH public key authentication
iacDescription.resolve: Set `disable_password_authentication` attribute to `true` or remove the attribute

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Storage Account does not enforce latest TLS
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Azure Storage Account does not enforce latest TLS version
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Older cipher suites could be vulnerable to hijacking and information disclosure

iacDescription.issue: Azure Storage Account does not enforce latest TLS version
iacDescription.impact: Older cipher suites could be vulnerable to hijacking and information disclosure

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Storage Account does not enforce HTTPS
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Azure Storage Account does not enforce HTTPS traffic only
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: The content could be intercepted and manipulated in transit

iacDescription.issue: Azure Storage Account does not enforce HTTPS traffic only
iacDescription.impact: The content could be intercepted and manipulated in transit

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: App Service allows FTP deployments
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: App Service allows FTP deployments
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: FTP is a plain-text protocol that is vulnerable to manipulation and eavesdropping

remediation.arm: Set `ftpsState` to `FtpsOnly` or `Disabled` if not needed

iacDescription.issue: App Service allows FTP deployments
iacDescription.impact: FTP is a plain-text protocol that is vulnerable to manipulation and eavesdropping

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: App Service HTTP/2 disabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: HTTP/2 is not enabled on the App Service
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: No security impact. Provides performance improvement.

iacDescription.issue: HTTP/2 is not enabled on the App Service
iacDescription.impact: No security impact. Provides performance improvement.

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: App Service authentication disabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Azure App Service authentication is not enabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Service may be accessible without authorization

remediation.arm: Set `properties.enabled` attribute to `true` in config resource

iacDescription.issue: Azure App Service authentication is not enabled
iacDescription.impact: Service may be accessible without authorization

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: App Service mutual TLS disabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: App Service mutual TLS disabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Clients without authorized certificate may be allowed to connect to the application

iacDescription.issue: App Service mutual TLS disabled
iacDescription.impact: Clients without authorized certificate may be allowed to connect to the application

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Ensure Diagnostic Setting captures appropriate categories
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Ensure Diagnostic Setting captures appropriate categories
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Not capturing the diagnostic setting categories for appropriate management activities leads to missing important alerts
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set log blocks for the categories `Administrative`,`Alert`,`Policy`,`Security` with `enabled` set to `true` for each

remediation.terraform: Set log blocks for the categories `Administrative`,`Alert`,`Policy`,`Security` with `enabled` set to `true` for each

iacDescription.issue: Ensure Diagnostic Setting captures appropriate categories
iacDescription.impact: Not capturing the diagnostic setting categories for appropriate management activities leads to missing important alerts
iacDescription.resolve: Set log blocks for the categories `Administrative`,`Alert`,`Policy`,`Security` with `enabled` set to `true` for each

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Vault secret expiration date not set
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Expiration date is not set for Azure Vault secret
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Secret rotation will not be enforced, which can lead to use of stale or compromised credentials
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `expiration_date` attribute to date in the future, with format `Y-m-d'T'H:M:S'Z'`, e.g.`2019-01-01T01:02:03Z`

remediation.terraform: Set `expiration_date` attribute to date in the future, with format `Y-m-d'T'H:M:S'Z'`, e.g.`2019-01-01T01:02:03Z`
remediation.arm: Set `properties.attributes.exp` attribute to date in the future time in seconds, e.g. `1658319657`

iacDescription.issue: Expiration date is not set for Azure Vault secret
iacDescription.impact: Secret rotation will not be enforced, which can lead to use of stale or compromised credentials
iacDescription.resolve: Set `expiration_date` attribute to date in the future, with format `Y-m-d'T'H:M:S'Z'`, e.g.`2019-01-01T01:02:03Z`
